import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { registerUser } from '../features/user/userAction' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import classes from '../assets/signUpForm.module.css' import adeel from '../pictures/adeel.jpeg' const SignUpForm = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm() const navigate = useNavigate() const submitForm = (data) => { if (data.password !== data.confirmPassword) { alert('Password mismatch') return } data.email = data.email.toLowerCase() dispatch(registerUser(data)) navigate('/login') console.log(data) } return (

Sign Up Today To Get Started

) } export default SignUpForm
